mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Comment (commentContent, commentDate, userNumber, feedNumber) VALUES (#{commentContent}, now(), #{userNumber}, #{feedNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT c.feedNumber, c.commentNumber, c.commentContent, c.commentDate, u.userID, u.userName, u.userNickName, u.userProfileContent FROM Comment c INNER JOIN User u ON c.userNumber = u.userNumber WHERE feedNumber = #{feedNumber}
